application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Apple, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height a spread of tree upon completion of works: 5 meters tall and 3 meters wide.T3. Pittosporum, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height a spread of tree upon completion of works: 5 meters tall and 3 meters wide.T4. Fig Tree, Crown Reduction - In order to shape and contain suggested works are too reduce and reshape crown all round (height and spread) by up to 1 metre. Estimated height a spread of tree upon completion of works: 4 meters tall and 3 meters wide.
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
